title: Looking for a bronze duo partner
body:
Hi, I am currently searching for  someone to duo with in and out of Bronze, I have only recently unlocked ranked and have already encountered trolls, hoping to decrease my chances of trolls by queuing up with someone.

P.S. I am a support main and Skype is available.

replies.body:
add me  i'm jungle with{{champion:23}}    or top with {{champion:86}}   
Skype is also available.

Hey im looking for a bronze duo partner as well, i main ADC i like to play {{champion:119}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:67}} , if you wanna duo with me i do have skype but will give you my skype once we start as a duo,
IGN: EndlesschocXD
